_sText:
===========================================
------------------------------------
**Installation:** gg_churches_remake.bsp goes into css/cstrike/maps

**Hosting: Please if you are a server owner please BZIP this before putting it in your map collection**
==================================
Explanation: This version of gg_churches is in no way a decompiled version of gg_churches_v2, I have decompiled the map to
take the measurements of the church the tunnels and the map in total, I have not copied anything... In the end my measurements were
way off in comparision to gg_churches_v2. gg_churches_remake is completely built up from scratch, obviously credit goes to the 
original author for the layout and design of the brushes that consume the map. 

---------------------------------------------------------------

===================================
Credits:

GG_CHURCHES_V2: The original author, for the layout, design, and the time that author has spent into his/her map.

gg_churches_remake: Dominic, for remaking gg_churches_v2 and ultimately making gg_churches a clean and more enjoyable experience.

---------------------------------------------------------------

====================================

Contact information: msnruler8@hotmail.com Please contact me if you have a question about the map, or how I created something. 

--------------------------------------------------------------

Other maps:
trade_mannconomy_v5g

any other map created by me was not a serious attempt at mapping.

If you actually read this, THANK YOU!
